word_json: {"wordRank":6,"headWord":"discourage","content":{"word":{"wordHead":"discourage","wordId":"CET4_3_6","content":{"sentence":{"sentences":[{"sContent":"You should not let one failure discourage you.","sCn":"你不该失败一次就灰心丧气。"}],"desc":"例句"},"realExamSentence":{"sentences":[{"sContent":"...In-class exams are believed to discourage cheating in exams...","sourceInfo":{"level":"CET4","year":"2017.12","type":"阅读理解"}}],"desc":"真题例句"},"usphone":"dɪs'kɝɪdʒ","syno":{"synos":[{"pos":"vt","tran":"阻止；使气馁","hwds":[{"w":"stem"},{"w":"block"},{"w":"dispute"},{"w":"prohibit"}]}],"desc":"同近"},"ukphone":"dɪs'kʌrɪdʒ","ukspeech":"discourage&type=1","remMethod":{"val":" dis(消失掉) ＋ courage(精神) → 使精神消失掉 → 使泄气","desc":"记忆"},"relWord":{"rels":[{"pos":"adj","words":[{"hwd":"discouraged","tran":" 气馁的"},{"hwd":"discouraging","tran":" 使人沮丧的；令人气馁的"}]},{"pos":"adv","words":[{"hwd":"discouragingly","tran":" 使人气馁地，使人沮丧地；阻止地"}]},{"pos":"n","words":[{"hwd":"discouragement","tran":" 气馁；挫折；劝阻"}]},{"pos":"v","words":[{"hwd":"discouraged","tran":" 劝阻（discourage的过去分词）；使失去勇气"},{"hwd":"discouraging","tran":" 沮丧（discourage的ing形式）；失去勇气"}]}],"desc":"同根"},"usspeech":"discourage&type=2","trans":[{"tranCn":" 使泄气， 使灰心； 阻止， 劝阻","descOther":"英释","pos":"vt","descCn":"中释","tranOther":"to make someone less confident or less willing to do something"}]}}},"bookId":"CET4_3"}
